description.narrative: The proposed project development objectives (PDOs) are: (a) to increase access to electricity; (b) to improve reliability of electricity service; and (c) to strengthen KPLC's financial situation.

participating-org.narrative: Rural Electrification and Renewable Energy Corporation

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :KPLC Project Implementation Unit (PIU) | Description :KPLC shall establish by no later than two months after theEffective Date and maintain thereafter until the completion of Components A, B, C1, and D1(d) of the Project, a PIU under terms ofreference and with staff in numbers and with qualifications satisfactory to IDA. | Due Date :31-Aug-2015

Finance Agreement :Rural Electrification Authority (REA) PIU | Description :REA shall establish by no later than two months afterthe Effective Date, and maintain until the completion of the Project, a PIU under terms of reference and with staff in numbers andwith qualifications satisfactory to IDA. | Due Date :31-Aug-2015

Finance Agreement :The Kenya Power and Lighting Company Limited's (KPLC) Financial Strategy | Description :KPLC shall, no laterthan six months after the Effective Date, adopt, in form and substance acceptable to the Association, a financial strategy tostrengthen its balance sheet and manage its capital investment program in a sustainable manner. | Due Date :31-Dec-2015

title.narrative: Free operational cash flow to debt

Establishment of a modern meter control center with satellites.
